data.eml:eml: Smicridea (Trichoptera, Hydropsychidae) from 3 Brazilian Amazonian States: New species, larval taxonomy and bionomics

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Albino, Jeyson Lazaro Duque, Pes, Ana Maria, Hamada, Neusa (2011): Smicridea (Trichoptera, Hydropsychidae) from 3 Brazilian Amazonian States: New species, larval taxonomy and bionomics. Zootaxa 3113: 1-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.279309
